body:
from what i can tell, after those special training and graduating, the couples started hanging out as a couple and had sex. ofc the girl couldn't be satisfied after 4 months of rough sex with sensei. she started using the dildo again to masturbate, and found sensei's phone number. after all of that she ultimately cheated the bf on her own by coming over to sensei's place through contact. and she even deliberately let her bf find out about this relationship. and also it ends here.
full of expected turn of events but still a good read anw. hoping for a translation
Boyfriend should be happy he   dodged a bullet there
